ComicInfo.Summary:
Life's no picnic. Still, Ella and Lou find some quiet time for romance. Too bad death proves to be a frequent third wheel. Don't miss the issue that changes the game for our star crossed lovers forever.
Lou and Ella spend their latest reincarnation on a date in the zoo. They tell each other about their lives before they started dying repeatedly and then decide to die together for the first time. They climb over a fence and get eaten by crocodiles. When Lou wakes up next, he is surprised to see that he is still the same guy.
More Love Stories to Die For: A man falls in sexual love with Siri, the iPhone's new gadget until his obsession reaches extreme heights.
